entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Maui iOS WebView - MauiWKWebView DidFinishNavigation not called. #20713
  • CollectionView with ItemsSource Binding is not currently being Garbage Collected #20710
  • Stepper doesn't change increment value when beeing bound to a double in MVVM context (Windows) #20706
  • ContentPage.ToolbarItems is not currently being Garbage Collected #20703
    Backlog
  • Java.Lang.NullPointerException at MauiAppCompatActivity.dispatchTouchEvent -crash #20698
  • [.NET 9 Hot Restart] - Cant build and debug MAUI application on iOS #20697
  • FlyoutHeader on iOS does not change it's size after adding new content #20696
    Backlog
  • [testing] Run Windows UITests with new .net sdk #20692
    Backlog
  • [Potential Regression] Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged app crash #20690
    .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Grid with custom MauiScrollview control and handler has wrong z index and changes when overscrolling #20689
    Backlog
  • [Android][MAUI-8.0.7] The CPU always maintains around 20%, even without any operation #20684
    Backlog

Closed

  • MenuBarItem Commands not working on Mac Catalyst #20685
    Backlog
  • Optimizing Assemblies for size limit #20490
  • VScode Maui Code build error #20680
  • EnableLLVM make Application Crash #20665
  • A possible use case for contentRootRelativePath being overridable #20405
  • iOS: CollectionView - Horizontal CollectionView does not show the last element under some conditions #15815
    .NET 8 SR3
  • using C/C++ library for iOS in maui project #20688
  • Could not find workload 'ios' extended by workload 'maui-ios' in manifest 'microsoft.net.sdk.maui' #20686
  • WorkloadManifestCompositionException while pairing Visual Studio to mac agent #20687

PullRequests

Created

  • [net9.0] [ci] Remove ForceNet8Current #20716
  • [net8.0] Update xharness #20712
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9.0 #20708
  • [Testing] Rework Appium Runner so that it goes directly to tests instead of navigates #20700
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Add Helpers to aide Debugging MSBuild tasks #20695
  • [Testing] Updated to latest RC.5 of Appium #20694
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Merged

  • [main] Update to stable iOS and Android workloads #20576
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Move entry related input view device tests to appium #20670
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-entry
  • [Catalyst] Fix Selectors for Menus #20699
    platform/macOS 🍏, control-menubar
  • [net9.0] Enable parallel builds back #20704
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, testing-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Figure a better EstimatedItemSize for HorizontalList #20022
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/collectionview 📃
  • Remove dotnet-format run for net7 branch #20702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove weird comment/copy&paste error #20693
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [net9.0] Fix test related issues #20639
    area/testing

Updated

  • [Core][Hosting] Resolve handler services through registered service types #20298
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Setup Android App With More Accurate settings #20672
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UITest to validate the Switch OnColor property #20542
    area/controls 🎮, area/testing, control-switch, testing-flakiness
  • [net8.0.] Update net8.0 with main #20563
  • Updated Development guide #20543
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Trimming] Use typed bindings internally #20567
    area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS] Shell page title fix #20575
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/shell 🐢, community ✨
  • [iOS] Double dash in input field crash fix #20584
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [Windows] Reenabled ReturnsNonEmptyNativeBoundingBox tests #20238
    platform/windows 🪟, area/testing, testing-reenable
  • [ios] update `MemoryAnalyzers` package, add to Controls #18318
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/perf 🏎️, stale, memory-leak 💦
  • [Windows] Implement `IdleSynchronizer` #20630
    platform/windows 🪟
  • [C] Parent Background Brush to propagate changes #20637
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Change activity attributes #20653
    platform/android 🤖
  • Improvement- alternative geodesic/geolocation distance calculation algorithms #20663
    area/Maps🗺
  • [Testing] Added categories to Controls.AppiumTests #20642
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Window] Fix transforms being offset by 0.5x0.5 #20454
    platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner
  • Better ARM support device tests/CI pipeline in general #18568
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/essentials 🍞, area/infrastructure 🏗️, area/testing, stale
  • Remove Switch On/Off content #20487
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-switch
  • iOS PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden - Implementation #20069
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area/platform
  • [Testing] NativeAOT: Stand up UI testing on iOS platforms #20541
    area/testing
